Ancestry-Elemental Scion-Fire -- Male Elemental Scion Novice Adventurer
Attributes (6 Points):
Agility: d6 Smarts: d4 Spirit: d6 Strength: d6 Vigor: d10
Skills (12 Points):
Academics: (sma) d4 Intimidation: (spi) d4 Shooting: (agi) d4
Alchemy: (sma) d4 Notice: (sma) d4 Stealth: (agi) d6
Athletics: (agi) d4 Persuasion: (spi) d4-1 Survival: (sma) d4
Battle: (sma) d4 Psionics: (sma) d4 Thievery: (agi) d4
Common Knowledge: (sma) d4 Repair: (sma) d4 Weird Science: (sma) d4
Skill Notes:
Mean: -1 Persuasion
Amorous: -2 on Tests by a foe w/the Attractive feature
Outsider: -2 Persuasion (other races)
Size: 0
Advances: 0 Improvement Points: 4 Improvement Points Allocation: Attribute: 2; Edge: 2
Features
Edges (2 points): Fey Blood; Fire Scion Hindrances: Amorous; Driven; Mean; Pacifist Elemental Scion Features: Elemental Connection; Outsider
Feature Notes:
Elemental Connection: +1 Edge Points (Choice of Air, Earth, Fire, or Water Scion)
Driven: Personal goal affects decision-making
Fire Scion: Has Environmental Resistance (Fire) and Quick features
Mean: Ill-tempered and disagreeable
Combat
Parry: 2 (0) Cover: 0 Toughness: 8 (1) Pace/Run: 6/+d6
Armor: Tunic Shield: None Weapons: Dagger (d6+d4 R3"); Short Bow (2d6 R12"); Unarmed (d6+d0)
Combat Notes:
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +5
Environmental Resistance (Fire): +4 vs. fire effects/-4 damage from fire effects
Fey Blood: May reroll resisting enemy powers and spell-like effects
Pacifist: Will harm others only when no other option available
Quick: May redraw Action Cards lower than 6
